messages.body:

Received: from mk-cpfront-3.mail.uk.tiscali.com ()
Received: from  


Hello, 

I am Mr. Erick Von Heinz, the bill and exchange manager of a bank in
Switzerland and I am contacting you on a business transfer of a huge sum
of money from 
a deceased account. Though I know that a transaction of this magnitude
will make any one apprehensive and worried, but I am assuring you that
all will be well at the end of the day. We decided to contact you due to
the urgency of this transaction. 

PROPOSITION; 

We discovered an abandoned sum of US$5,500,000.00 (five million five
hundred thousand united states dollars) in an account that belongs to
one of our foreign customers who is an army general in Iraq who died
along with his entire family in the US Iraqi war. Since his death, none
of his next-of-kin or relations has come forward to lay claims for this
money as the heir. We cannot release the fund from his account 
unless someone applies for claim as the next-of-kin to the deceased as
indicated in our banking guidelines. Upon this discovery, we now seek
your permission to have you stand as a next of kin to the deceased as
all documentations will be carefully worked out by us for the funds
(US$5,500,000.00) to be released in your favour as the beneficiary's
next of kin. It may interest you to know that we have secured from the 
probate an order of madamus to locate any of deceased beneficiaries. 

Please acknowledge receipt of this message in acceptance of our mutual
business endeavour by furnishing me with the following; 

1. Beneficiary name and address. 

2. Direct Telephone and Fax numbers. 

These requirements will enable us file letter of claim to the
appropriate departments for necessary approvals in your favour before
the transfer can be made. We shall be compensating you with a million
dollars on final conclusion of this project, while the rest shall be for
us. Your share stays while the rest shall be for us for investment
purposes. If this proposal is acceptable by you, do not take undue
advantage of the trust we have bestowed in you, 

please reply to my personal email: (mrvonheinz_20042@excite.com 
I await your urgent mail. 

Regards, 

Mr. Erick Von Heinz. 

Please because of the confidentiality of this transaction, I strictly
advice you to copy your response to my private e-mail address
mrvonheinz_20042@excite.com

messages.subject: Waiting to hear from you.
messages.body:
Mr. Joseph Stalin, 

Thank you very much for your response to my business proposal. I really
appreciate your gesture. Let me use this opportunity to re-affirm to you
that my decision to carry out this transaction with you is not a mistake
is with all sincerity of purpose. What I simply require from you is for
you to assure me that the money will be safe in your hands and that you
will maintain a high level of confidentiality, which this transaction
demands. 

Your role is basically to front as the next of kin to Steve Moore, so as
to put in a claim for the said fund and the money will be transferred to
you by normal banking transfer method through a corresponding bank to be
on a safer side. But before this I will require you to send some
information about your self to me to enable me prepare documents to give
you title to the claim. The information needed are: 

1. Your full name and your complete address including your company and
home address. 
2. Your personal phone and fax numbers including mobile phone if any to
enable us have better communication by voice. 

Please be rest assured as all modalities have been set to ensure the
completeness of the transaction within ten working days from the date we
file in your letter of claim. Also this transaction requires utmost
confidentiality, trust and commitment on both side. 
As we have not had any personal contact we should try and show true
transparency and honesty in the cause of this transaction, as we shall
have cause to celebrate at the end. I am 54 years old and would not want
to compromise my position in my bank also I would be out to protect you
during the cause of this business. 

You could reach me on my personal telephone number:+41-76-432-9560 for
further discussions. I will appreciate your respond as soon as possible.


Best Regards, 
Mr. Erick Von Heinz.

driven around in Benzes and BMW's. Me they give a Lada, and the damned

uh, Germanic persuasion?

That's all I've got for now. Let me know what we have to do next.

Hui Tebya,

Joseph Stalin

messages.body:
Hello Joseph, 

Thank you for your mail and the information you have sent, But before
will commence this transaction, I will require from you any form of
identification of yourself. See attachment for my ID and I will also be
sending the last bank statement of the deceased just to prove to you
what I say. I need you to send me any valid identification e.g. your
drivers license or a copy of your international passport. You can scan
and send to me through email attachment of one of this for me to have a
recognition of whom I am dealing with. This is very important for us to
begin.

 I am with Valiant Privatbank AG, Switzerland. Note that I am a seasoned
banker who knows the intricacies involved both local and international
banking laws as the case may be. All inheritance taxes here in bern will
be taken care of by me as well as handle all aspects with my bank to
release the funds in your favour. I will be the one to secure the change
of beneficiary documents in your favour as all modalities have been put
in place to achieve this goal. 

Once this is presented to my bank, an approval for the deposit that I
shall influence will be granted for the funds to be paid to you directly
or through the correspondent bank, as I shall specify in the beneficiary
applications for transfer approval. 

You will be required to possess a good account to house the funds,
pending the eventual transfer into your bank account. Once you have the
transfer approval, you can also effect the transfer online via the
Internet into your bank account from the comfort of your home. 

Please, remember that I am 54 years old and I have put in over 19 years
in the banking industry and as such I would not want to compromise my
career. Keep this highly confidential. If I could do this alone I will
not have contacted you. I believe that I have been explicit enough. You
shall be duly compensated as earlier stated. 

You can reach me on my personal telephone number: +41-76-432-9560 for
further discussions. I await to hear from you for us to proceed. 

Regards, 
Mr. Erick Von Heinz. 

NB. I will also need you to get the mobile phone, telephone
communication is very important in this transaction.

messages.body:
Joseph, 

Sorry that you did not hear from me for this long, I was getting all
documentation together. I have gone ahead to proceed this morning by
submitting the application presenting you as the next-of-kin. In
addition to the application which I presented to my bank on your behalf,
I have proceeded with the change of beneficiary documents through our
legal unit in your favour from the department of justice as well as the
high court for a probate registry certificate which will be included in
your file for vetting and approval by my bank. Once this is stamp duties
and returned to my bank, an approval for the deposit, which I shall
influence, should be granted for the deposit to be directed to a
correspondent bank for payment to you. 

Everything is now in place and I am going to push it with all I have got
so that the governing board vet over it during the next sitting. I must
advice you to be very close to your phone and fax and always check your
email, as I am not sure of which way you would be contacted. 

I will handle all requirements demanded by my bank and please never you
mention that you have an insider in my bank, it is important you
maintain confidentiality at least till we are able to get the funds out
of my bank. Do not hesitate to update me once my bank contacts you and I
will also do same from here as soon as I receive any news. 

With all the monies I will be spending on your behalf on gratifications
as well as documentations to be submitted along with processing your
application, success will definitely be ours. I am sure you are capable
of handling this pet transaction of ours and please note that this may
just be the beginning of a lifetime relationship between us. 

I urge you to work with me in spirit for success, as there is enough
accruable for us from this project. 

I await your confirmation of this mail. 

Regards 
Von Heinz. 

NB. You have not sent your identification yet, please do send it as soon
as poosible, it is very important.

messages.body:
Mr. Von Heinz,

From your last email it sounds as if you're well on top of the
situation. There is nothing I respect more than hard work and
efficiency, but then you Germans have always been known for these
traits. I remember before the war I used to enjoy watching the films of
German military parades in Berlin. So precise, so efficient, the rows of
soldiers marching in perfect unison to the sound of tubas. Not like
those Italian parades, with a ragtag bunch playing concertinas at the
front, soldiers dropping their rifles to chase after girls. But I
digress.

Let's discuss the matter of my identification - you obviously know who I
am as it was you who first approached me. Which brings up an interesting
question - how did you locate me? Before I go to all the trouble of
obtaining a passport just to prove to you who I am, I would like to see
some evidence that these funds actually exist. You would be able to
provide such documentation, would you not?

Secondly, your last email mentioned the amount of money you would be
spending on 'my' behalf for 'gratifications'. Correct me if I'm wrong,
but the money is actually being spent on 'our' behalf, da? And can you
explain what is actually meant by 'gratifications'? This could be
anything from bribes to paying for hand-jobs. Please elaborate.

I also asked you previously (twice) what the term 'modality' means,
which you never explained.

You will please pardon my inquisitiveness. Call me silly, but as a
former member of the government here, I have always strived (strove?
striven? Pardon me, but, again,  English is not my native language) for
true Soviet efficiency and accuracy.

I anxiously await to hear from you again.

Hui Tebya,
J.V. Stalin

ps - Do you have any military experience? I ask only out of curiousity.

[]

Hello Joseph,

Let me start by answering your questions. 

I got your contact information from my bank, from the banks directory. I need your identification so that I can know you facially because once the funds are approved and transfer out of my bank to your nominated bank account, I will be coming over to Moscow to meet with you and collect my share of the money. I will like to invest part of the money in your country and I will like for you to introduce to me a good business opportunity in your country I can invest part of my money on. So I will still need you to send me your identification.

You said you will like to see some evidence that these funds actually exist, but I did send to you the last bank statement of the decease, or are you saying you did not receive it? If that is the case, I am attaching it again on this mail for your perusal.

So if you call it gratifications or bribes it is all the same thing provided the funds is successfully transferred out on my bank. I also want to inform you that I was able to achieve some progress yesterday and I am very hopeful that your transfer approval should the granted before the end of this week when the governing board of my bank will sits over various claims and approval. 

Please note that I introduced you to my bank in all documentations submitted as the only surviving nephew to the deceased, just in case you are asked when you are contacted. Do well to inform me once you are contacted for proper advise from me on what to do or say to them. I used your name as signature where required, all that is important now is for us to pray that we secure the necessary approval this week. Also note that I specified that you be contacted via fax or email so you will have to check with me first before responding to them. 

I shall update you accordingly, please send me your telephone number so that I can call you once I get any information to pass across.

Please confirm receipt of this mail. 

Regards,

Von.

Mr. Von Heinz,

I received your email with the last bank statement attached. 

You mention that I'm going to be contacted, but you did not mention by
whom. What exactly will be the nature and subject of the contact, and
when do you anticipate the contact?

Since I am posing as this Iraqi's nephew, please give me some details
about how he died. It would probably also be a good idea if I knew some

lived, that sort of thing. I may be expected to know these things and I
want to be prepared.

You still have not explained what you mean by 'modality', though this is
the fourth time I've asked. Is this some kind of legal term?

I'll see if I can't get a secure phone line set up tomorrow. I'll get
the number to you as soon as I can. Let me know if anything else happens
that I should be aware of.

Hui Tebye,
J.V. Stalin

I may be expected to know these things and I want to be prepared.

You still have not explained what you mean by 'modality', though this is the fourth time I've asked. Is this some kind of legal term?

I'll see if I can't get a secure phone line set up tomorrow. I'll get the number to you as soon as I can. Let me know if anything else happens that I should be aware of.

Hui Tebye,
J.V. Stalin
